title: Hide your purse, Steam is having a stealth-game sale
text:
Hide your purse, Steam is having a stealth-game sale 
Published By: Eurogamer.net - Today 
I wonder: do you end up saving money in sales or spending more because things are on sale? Regardless, Steam is having a sale, a stealth-gam...
